name: Light Borrower
description: Join Rachel as she faces the Cleansing, a coming-of-age ritual that will determine whether she joins the last survivors of the end of the world or is banished above ground.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or newer Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space
